Sentence: Harris describes the numerous times Snopes's hog broke through the fence and got into his (Harris) cornfields
The judge dismisses the charges against Snopes but warns him (Harris) to leave the county for good, and Snopes agrees to comply
Snopes and his (Harris) two sons then leave the store and head to their wagon
Snopes orders Sartoris into the wagon, which is laden with their possessions and where his (Harris) two sisters, mother, and aunt are waiting
Snopes prevents his (Harris) crying wife from cleaning Sartoris's bloodied face
